generation_workflow.step_1: Generate Prompt A (background only) to establish the scene
generation_workflow.step_2: Generate Prompt B (with person) using reference image for face consistency
generation_workflow.step_3: Quality check: verify facial features match reference exactly
generation_workflow.step_4: Upload to Google Drive portrait folder for backup
generation_workflow.step_5: Use across YouTube thumbnails, channel art, website, and social media
